Reviews.Title: “Warm and friendly atmosphere plus great location! What a great little find!”

Reviews.Content: reading reviews tripadvisor decided stay hostel short trip madrid contacted hostel friendly helpful replied straight soon arrived greeted friendly staff shown spotless cleaned daily space extra bed airconditioning tv beautiful view balcony bathroom clean provided fresh clean towels day hostel location near plaza mayor puerta de sol definitely recommend stay plus free wifi
